title: The Island of the Dolls (Mexico)
description: A haunting island in Xochimilco, Mexico, covered in decaying dolls said to be possessed by the spirit of a drowned girl.
author: Aman

title: Pacific Crest Trail Disappearances
description: The Pacific Crest Trail, stretching 2,650 miles through the U.S., has seen a number of hikers vanish under mysterious circumstances, sparking theories of foul play and unexplained phenomena.
author: Aman

title: Red Rooms and Alleged Live Killings
description: Dark web “Red Rooms” allegedly streamed live torture and murder, creating one of the creepiest modern internet legends.
author: Aman

title: The Dyatlov Pass Incident
description: Nine hikers vanished in the frozen Ural Mountains — their deaths remain one of history's strangest unsolved mysteries.
author: Aman

title: The Hinterkaifeck Murders
description: A remote farmhouse, an entire family slaughtered, and the killer lived there for days afterward.
author: Aman

title: The Disappearance of Ashley Elkins
description: Hairstylist and mom of two vanished in early 2025 — evidence points to horrific violence and still no body found.
author: Aman
